mapper.select:
select dbo.mach_type(mach_no) stationType, id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0) generationTime, inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime FROM View_mach where 1=1
AND ( dbo.cus_no(mach_no ) = #{username})
order by id

SELECT i.id ,dbo.p_name(i.mach_no) st_name ,i.mach_no ,i.st_coordinate ,dbo.p_state(i.mach_no) st_state ,dbo.p_Acityelectricity(i.mach_no) Acity_electricity FROM id i JOIN c_mach m ON m.mach_no=i.mach_no AND m.cus_no=#{user_cus}

select COUNT(1) siteCount FROM View_mach where 1=1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})

select COUNT(1) siteCount FROM View_mach where DATEDIFF(mi,inter_time,GETDATE()) <= 3
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})

select COUNT(1) siteCount FROM View_mach where DATEDIFF(mi,inter_time,GETDATE()) > 3
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})

select COUNT(1) siteCount FROM View_mach where state = 1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})

select COUNT(1) siteCount FROM View_mach where city_electricity = 1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})

select dbo.mach_type(mach_no), id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0), inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime from View_mach where 1 = 1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})
AND st_add like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
order by id

select dbo.mach_type(mach_no), id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0), inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime from View_mach where 1=1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})
AND DATEDIFF(mi,inter_time,GETDATE()) > 3 order by id

select dbo.mach_type(mach_no), id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0), inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime from View_mach where 1=1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})
AND DATEDIFF(mi,inter_time,GETDATE()) <= 3 order by id

select dbo.mach_type(mach_no), id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0), inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime from View_mach where 1=1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})
AND state = 1 order by id

select dbo.mach_type(mach_no), id, st_name, st_no, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_voltage, isnull(dbo.get_time(mach_no),0), inter_time, DATEDIFF(SS,inter_time,GETDATE()) lengthtime from View_mach where 1=1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{username})
AND city_electricity = 1 order by id
SELECT ST_NAME, st_per1, st_pertel1 FROM C_station WHERE st_no = #{stationId}

select id, dbo.mach_type(mach_no) stationType, st_name, st_current, Acity_electricity, Cabinet_temperature, external_temperature, start_Voltage, dbo.sum_time(mach_no) sum_time, st_voltage, lank_level, lank_level/100 lank_percent, inter_time, dbo.get_time(mach_no) oliPercentage, stop_time, state WHERE st_no = #{stationId}
mapper.update: UPDATE C_mach SET start_Voltage = #{changeVoltage, jdbcType = DECIMAL} WHERE mach_no = #{mach_no}
UPDATE C_mach SET maintain_time = #{currentServiceTime,jdbcType = DECIMAL} WHERE mach_no = #{mach_no}
UPDATE C_mach SET stop_time = #{currentStopTime, jdbcType = DECIMAL} WHERE mach_no = #{mach_no}
mapper.select: select id, st_name, st_state, Acity_electricity, st_coordinate FROM View_mach where st_no = #{stationId} order by id
select id, st_name, st_no, st_type, cus_no, st_coordinate, st_add, unit_add, st_per1, st_pertel1, st_per2, st_pertel2 FROM C_station where id = #{stationId} order by id
mapper.update: UPDATE C_station SET st_name = #{stationName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_no = #{stationNumber, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_type = #{stationType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, cus_no = #{usercus, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_coordinate = #{stationPosition, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_add = #{stationAddress, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, unit_add = #{companyAddress, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_per1 = #{stationContactManA, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_pertel1 = #{contactManPhoneA, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_per2 = #{stationContactManB, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, st_pertel2 = #{contactManPhoneB, jdbcType = VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{stationId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collect ( st_name, st_no, st_type, cus_no, st_coordinate, st_add, unit_add, st_per1, st_pertel1, st_per2, st_pertel2 ) VALUES( #{stationName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationNumber, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{usercus, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationPosition, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationAddress, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{companyAddress, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationContactManA, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{contactManPhoneA, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{stationContactManB, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{contactManPhoneB, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, )
mapper.select: select mach_no, dbo.mach_name(mach_no) stationNumber,start_time, end_time, DATEDIFF(mi,start_time,ISNULL(end_time,GETDATE())) num_time from Ap_time where mach_no=#{st_no}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO C_mach ( mach_name, mach_no, model_no, vender_name, power_num, cus_no, creator, use_type, mach_type, fuel_type, state, purch_time, note, volumeno, gprsno ) VALUES( #{mach_name, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{model_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{vender_name, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{power_num, jdbcType = DECIMAL}, #{cus_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{use_type, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mach_type, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{fuel_type, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{state, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{purch_time, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{note, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{volumeno, jdbcType = DECIMAL}, #{gprsno, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
)

INSERT INTO Ap_collar ( co_no, co_time, co_per, co_tel, st_no, mach_no, co_add, creat_time, creat_per ) VALUES( #{co_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{co_time, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{co_per, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{co_tel, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{st_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{use_address, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select mach_no,mach_name, mach_type, st_state, city_electricity, al_voltage, isnull(dbo.sum_time(mach_no),0)/60 sum_time ,dbo.sumnum_time(mach_no) sumnum_time,state,isnull(start_Vo,0) start_Vo, state1,isnull(Expr2,0)-isnull(dbo.sum_time(mach_no),0)/60 maintain_time,isnull(lank_level,0) lank_per,st_current,isnull(cabinet_temperature,0) external_temperature,isnull(lank_level,0)*isnull(volumeno,0)/100 lank_level from View_mach1 where 1=1
AND cus_no = #{user_cus}

select mach_no, st_state, city_electricity, Acity_electricity,al_voltage, isnull(dbo.sum_time(mach_no),0)/60 sum_time ,dbo.sumnum_time(mach_no) sumnum_time,state,start_Voltage, state1,isnull(lank_level,0) lank_per, st_current,isnull(cabinet_temperature,0) external_temperature from View_mach where 1=1
AND dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{user_cus}

select COUNT(1) machineCount FROM View_mach1 where 1=1
AND cus_no = #{user_cus}

select COUNT(1) machineCount FROM View_mach1 where DATEDIFF(mi,inter_time,GETDATE()) <= 3
AND cus_no = #{user_cus}

select COUNT(1) machineCount FROM View_mach1 where (DATEDIFF(mi,inter_time,GETDATE())>3 or inter_time is null)
AND cus_no = #{user_cus}

select COUNT(1) machineCount FROM View_mach1 where isnull(Expr1,1)=0
AND cus_no = #{user_cus}

select COUNT(1) machineCount FROM View_mach1 where isnull(Expr1,1) =1
AND cus_no = #{user_cus}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Ap_operate VALUES( #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, 1, '84 05 01 00 00 00 01 02 16', getdate(), #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, '0' )
INSERT INTO Ap_operate VALUES ( #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, 2, '84 05 01 00 00 00 02 03 16', getdate(), #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, '0' )
INSERT INTO Ap_operate VALUES ( #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{modelflag, jdbcType =INTEGER}, #{code, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, '0' )
INSERT INTO Ap_operate VALUES ( #{mach_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{modelflag, jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{code, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{user_no, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, '0' )
mapper.select:
SELECT co_no, co_time, co_per, co_tel, st_no, mach_no, co_add, CONVERT(varchar(100), creat_time, 20), creat_per FROM Ap_collar WHERE 1 = 1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{user_cus})
AND (co_time >= #{strat_time})
AND (co_time <= #{end_time})

select Acity_electricity,isnull(cabinet_temperature,0) external_temperature,CONVERT(varchar(100), inter_time, 20)inter_time ,isnull(dbo.mach_type(mach_no),0) stationType, isnull(start_Vo,0) start_Voltage,isnull(al_voltage,0) al_voltage,isnull(lank_level,0) lank_per,isnull(lank_level,0)*isnull(volumeno,0)/100, isnull(st_current,0) st_current, state1, isnull(st_co,0) st_co ,isnull(dbo.sum_time(mach_no),0) sum_time,isnull(Expr2,0)-isnull(dbo.sum_time(mach_no),0)/60 maintain_time,isnull(st_voltage,0) st_voltag,isnull(Expr1,0) Expr1 FROM View_mach1 WHERE mach_no = #{mach_no} order by mach_no

select Acity_electricity,isnull(cabinet_temperature,0) external_temperature,isnull(CONVERT(varchar(100), inter_time, 20),0) inter_time ,isnull(dbo.mach_type(mach_no),0) stationType, isnull(start_Vo,0) start_Voltage,isnull(lank_level,0) lank_per,isnull(lank_level,0)*isnull(volumeno,0)/100 lank_level , isnull(st_current,0) st_current,state1, isnull(st_co,0) st_co ,isnull(dbo.sum_time(mach_no),0) sum_time,isnull(Expr2,0)-isnull(dbo.sum_time(mach_no),0)/60 maintain_time,isnull(st_voltage,0) st_voltag,isnull(Expr1,0) Expr1,isnull(al_voltage,0) al_voltage FROM View_mach1 WHERE mach_no = #{mach_no} order by mach_no

select Acity_electricity,isnull(cabinet_temperature,0) external_temperature,isnull(CONVERT(varchar(100), inter_time, 20),0) inter_time ,isnull(dbo.mach_type(mach_no),0) stationType, isnull(start_Vo,0) start_Voltage,isnull(lank_level,0) lank_per,isnull(lank_level,0)*isnull(volumeno,0)/100 lank_level , isnull(st_current,0) st_current,state1, isnull(st_co,0) st_co ,isnull(dbo.sum_time(mach_no),0) sum_time,isnull(Expr2,0)-isnull(dbo.sum_time(mach_no),0)/60 maintain_time,isnull(st_voltage,0) st_voltag,isnull(Expr1,0) Expr1,isnull(al_voltage,0) al_voltage FROM View_mach1 WHERE mach_no = #{mach_no} order by mach_no

select top 5 ID, mach_no,dbo.p_name(mach_no) p_name, action,CONVERT(varchar(100), inter_time, 20) inter_time from Ap_warning where 1=1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{user_cus})
order by id desc

select top 50 ID, mach_no,dbo.p_name(mach_no) p_name, action,CONVERT(varchar(100), inter_time, 20) inter_time from Ap_warning where 1=1
AND (dbo.cus_no(mach_no) = #{user_cus})
order by id desc
